tei:elementSpec.tei:desc: This map is used to model random fluctuations. The domain, however, is unspecified.

tei:remarks.tei:p: The domain of this type of imprecision map is unspecified. This means it is up to the user/application to interpret it or introduce a domain-specific imprecision map (e.g. imprecisionMap.myDomain) to the format.
